Name Default Description timestampFormat (none) By default, the timestamp is not formatted; To format the timestamp using set the property with the corresponding DateTimeFormatter string, for example, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ prettyPrint false Whether the JSON output should be formatted for human readability.
